ygData.subject: Re: The Real Scoop on Genni
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Or better yet get caught by the testers. Assuming they actually have testers, which I ve had my doubts about for quite a while now. -- Artificial
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Oct 18/99, John Robertson <johnr@...> wrote:
> From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
>

> This was just more obvious than most. As soon as I heard there was an
> exploit involving this NPC, it took me about 2 seconds to guess what
> it was. You'd think it might occur to a developer before it went to
> live servers. :(

Or better yet get caught by the testers. Assuming they actually have
testers, which I've had my doubts about for quite a while now.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
